price: Dan Tuhan-mu lebih mengetahui siapa yang (ada) di langit dan di bumi.  Dan sesungguhnya telah Kami lebihkan sebagian nabi-nabi itu atas sebagian (yang lain) dan Kami berikan Zabur kepada Dāwūd.
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَلَقَدۡ فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ زَبُورٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: warabbuka aʿlamu biman fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walaqad faḍḍalnā baʿḍa al-nabiyīna ʿalā baʿḍin waātaynā dāwūda zabūran
